title: Tree-Level Scattering Amplitudes
critical_issues: High-energy limit claim incorrect for gg->gg

results.name: High-energy limit qq→qq
results.notes: gg→gg ratio: 2.53 (grows ~ s² as expected for Regge)

results.name: gg→gg factor error detection
results.notes: Document/Correct ratio = 4.00 (should be 1, is 4 due to error)

results.name: tt̄ partonic cross-section
results.notes: Peak σ(gg→tt̄) = 6.8 pb, Peak σ(qq̄→tt̄) = 11.3 pb. Hadronic σ requires PDF convolution (~500 pb tree-level).
